transcript.text: You've been warned, you've seen the title, you couldn't cry near my chest, neither close to my calf.

*Death Note music*

It's a game that the script is kind of the same as Saw. We awake in a place we don't know, it's hardcore, disgusting.

There are many rooms and everytime, we have to pass one test to go into the next room. 
Here we go. It's in English but it's subtitled in French.
Let's do the experience together but don't be afraid, I'm here.
